text: Abakuwe mungo zabo atakuri kurimwo mugabo kumpamvu yuko bavuze bati:- Umuremyi wacu niyo Mana, niyaba Imana itabakingiye abantu bamwe muribo, ntankeka abantu bari gusenyura amasengero n’ayandi masengero avugirwamwo izina ry’Imana mugihe cose, kandi ntankeka Imana niyo nyene ubushobozi n’intsinzi ihagije
